channel.title: CVE Feed for The libvirt Project -- libvirt
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The libvirt Project -- libvirt

item.title: CVE-2017-2635|2024-08-05T14:02:06.995Z -- the%20libvirt%20project -- libvirt
item.description: A NULL pointer deference flaw was found in the way libvirt from 2.5.0 to 3.0.0 handled empty drives. A remote authenticated attacker could use this flaw to crash libvirtd daemon resulting in denial of service.
